text:
Ryan Gosling has won the hearts of many during past several years with his acting talent and his looks, but there’s even more to him.

Gosling was a guest on The Ellen DeGeneres Show this Friday and told a sad story of him recently losing his best friend. His dog, George, passed away aged 17 last December. Gosling said he was “a good friend to [him]”.

He proceeded to remember how George was his companion on every set. Apparently, he was less of a dog and more of a gentleman. He even joined a dinner party at one point by hopping on a free chair at the table. As Gosling said, “I think he felt like being a dog was beneath him.”

Watch the video of him on Ellen’s show below.
title: Ryan Gosling’s Tribute to His Dog George Will Wreck You
